Website Type

Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Ads Manager

How to get the Google AdSense code:
For new AdSense accounts the ads won't be displayed immediately. A blank space will be shown until your account is fully approved by Google, which can take up to 24 hours.
Homepage Ads Status
ON - To disable showing ads on the homepage, remove the Adsense promo from the "PAGES" tab.
Off - To enable showing ads on the homepage, add the Adsense promo from the "PAGES" tab.
Active ads inside pages?
Adsense ads will display your ads 70% of the time and system generated ads 30% of the time. To have 100% coverage, please upgrade your site to one of our premium plans. Upgrade

        Advanced formatting options

        Use these codes inside your titles:
        • example = example
        • *example* = example
        • **example** = example (It will use your website main color)
        • _example_ = example
        • __example__ = example
        • ___example___ = example
        Notes:
        You can use up to 5 types of format on one word.
